kr/scripts/core.js,\ kr/scripts/dhtml.js,\ kr/scripts/my_common.js,\ kr/scripts/jscalendar-1.0/calendar.js,\ kr/scripts/jscalendar-1.0/lang/calendar-en.js,\ kr/scripts/jscalendar-1.0/calendar-setup.js,\ dwr/engine.js,dwr/util.js,\ dwr/interface/PersonService.js,\ kr/scripts/objectInfo.js,\ scripts/rice-overrides.js
kr/scripts/my_common.js
kr/css/kuali.css,kr/scripts/jscalendar-1.0/calendar-win2k-1.css css/portal.css
false
\ 
\ monitoring
\ net.bull.javamelody.MonitoringFilter
\ 
\ url-exclude-pattern
\ /static/.*|/kr/static/.*|/kr/images/.*|/images-portal/.*
\ 
\ 
\ system-actions-enabled
\ ${javamelody.system.actions.enabled}
\ 
\ 
\ 
\ monitoring
\ /*
\ 
\ 
\ net.bull.javamelody.SessionListener
\ 

\ 
		CAS Authentication Filter\ 
		org.jasig.cas.client.authentication.AuthenticationFilter\ 
		\ 
			casServerLoginUrl\ 
			${cas.url}/login\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			serverName\ 
			${appserver.url}\ 
		\ 
	\ 
	\ 
		CAS Validation Filter\ 
		org.jasig.cas.client.validation.Cas20ProxyReceivingTicketValidationFilter\ 
		\ 
			casServerUrlPrefix\ 
			${cas.url}\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			serverName\ 
			${appserver.url}\ 
		\ 
	\ 
	\ 
		CAS HttpServletRequest Wrapper Filter\ 
		org.jasig.cas.client.util.HttpServletRequestWrapperFilter\ 
	
\ 
		CAS Authentication Filter\ 
			action\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS Validation Filter\ 
			action\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS HttpServletRequest Wrapper Filter\ 
			action\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS Authentication Filter\ 
			dwr-invoker\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS Validation Filter\ 
			dwr-invoker\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS HttpServletRequest Wrapper Filter\ 
			dwr-invoker\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS Authentication Filter\ 
			batchFileUpload\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS Validation Filter\ 
			batchFileUpload\ 
		\ 
		\ 
			CAS HttpServletRequest Wrapper Filter\ 
			batchFileUpload\ 
		
${core.struts.config.files}${institution.struts.config.files} ${core.rice.struts.message.resources}${optional.module.rice.struts.message.resources}${institution.rice.struts.message.resources}
${core.jstl.constants.classnames}${institution.jstl.constants.classnames}
${core.javascript.files}${institution.javascript.files} ${core.portal.javascript.files}${institution.portal.javascript.files}
${core.css.files}${institution.css.files} ${core.portal.css.files}${institution.portal.css.files}
